name: inline-blame-mini
description: Lightweight git blame information for the current cursor line

inlineBlameMini.enabled.description: Enable or disable inline git blame

inlineBlameMini.maxSummary.description: Maximum length of commit message summary

inlineBlameMini.debounceDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before updating blame information when cursor moves

inlineBlameMini.showCurrentUserAsYou.description: Show 'You' instead of your name for commits you authored

inlineBlameMini.style.color.description: Color of the inline blame text. Can be a VS Code theme color ID or CSS color value (e.g., '#888888', 'rgba(136,136,136,0.7)')

inlineBlameMini.style.fontStyle.description: Font style of the inline blame text

inlineBlameMini.style.fontWeight.description: Font weight of the inline blame text

inlineBlameMini.style.fontSize.description: Font size of the inline blame text (e.g., '12px', '0.9em'). Empty string uses editor font size

inlineBlameMini.style.opacity.description: Opacity of the inline blame text (0.1 to 1.0)

inlineBlameMini.style.margin.description: CSS margin for the inline blame text (e.g., '0 0 0 1rem', '0 20px')

inlineBlameMini.style.textDecoration.description: Text decoration for the inline blame text

inlineBlameMini.style.preset.description: Apply a predefined style preset. 'custom' uses individual style settings.

scripts.dev: bun run lint && bun run format
